title: A Star Reborn: The Queen’s Return - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manhua   Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Celebrities   Character Growth   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Cruel Characters   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Triangles   Modern Day   Music   Poor to Rich   Possessive Characters   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   Reincarnation   R*pe   Sadistic Characters   S*xual Abuse   Showbiz   Singers   Stockholm Syndrome   Wealthy Characters
author: Xia Wanying
description:
She died in her prime as the Queen of Song.

After being reincarnated, she becomes a simple trainee.

Losing her former glory? It doesn't matter—no one can compete with her voice as a beautiful singer.

Mocked by her lowly birth? It doesn't matter—her true identity is enough to make the whole world tremble.

She owes huge debts? It doesn't matter...

A powerful boss once whispered to her, 'Your debt will disappear if you become my woman.'

But the proud her would reply, 'I'm sorry. I would sell my art, but not myself.'>
